sentences.en: Advice will be given as a chargeable service.
Any damage to the installations in the house is chargeable.
sentences.cn: 屋内设施若有损坏,必须赔偿.

sentences.en: Any expenses you may incur will be chargeable to the company.
sentences.cn: 你的所有开销均由本公司支付。

sentences.en: Any expenses you may incur will be chargeable to the company.
sentences.cn: 你的所有开销都可以由公司偿付.

sentences.en: Any work arising from these instances will be chargeable.
sentences.cn: 因以上各项原因而要求技师出勤,将收取额外之服务费.

sentences.en: Built - in FM radio module, Chargeable lithium battery.
sentences.cn: 内 置 的调频收音机模块, 收费锂电池.

sentences.en: He is chargeable with a fault or neglect.
sentences.cn: 他可能因过失或疏忽而被控告.

sentences.en: If you steal, you are chargeable with theft.
sentences.cn: 如果偷窃就可能被控偷窃罪.

sentences.en: Re - inspection, for whatever reason , shall be chargeable to the exporter.
sentences.cn: 而不论哪种情况的复检, 都应可向出口商征收费用.

sentences.en: The chargeable services you required need you to pay by yourself.
sentences.cn: 您所需要的一些收费项目的费用需要您来承担.

sentences.en: The crime is chargeable on him.
The day of departure is not chargeable if rooms are vacated by 12.00 noon.
sentences.cn: 如果在中午12点前退房，当天不计费。

sentences.en: The expense is chargeable on [ to ] him [ his account ].
sentences.cn: 那笔费用该由他负责 [ 可记在他的帐上 ].
这个疑犯可以受到指控.

sentences.en: These debts are chargeable to me.
sentences.cn: 这些债可记在我的账上.

sentences.en: Where can our guest borrow the umbrella? Is chargeable?
sentences.cn: 客人可以在哪里借到伞? 需要费用吗?

words.tran_cn: 费用；电荷；掌管；控告；命令；负载
充电器；军马；袭击者；委托者；控诉者
充电；控告；索价；向前冲；记在账上
使充电；使承担；指责；装载；对…索费；向…冲去

trans.tran_cn: 可以控诉的，可记在某项账目上的，可充电的
